About the The Algoma University Financial Aid

The The Algoma University University The Algoma University University Financial Aid programme is given to students in the form Grants and Loans to assist students manage the studentship in the University. The aids is given from both Government of Canada and the University.

Eligibility for The Algoma University Financial Aids

To be eligible to qualify for the University financial Aids programme, applicants must be fully admitted to take a course in the University and also fulfill all requirements as indigene of the state or fully registered as international students residing in the state for the purpose of taking a course in the University.

How to Apply| How to apply for The Algoma University Financial Aid

  • To apply for the The Algoma University The Trinity Western.  University Financial Aid,
  • Submit your OSAP application online,
  • Print and sign the consents and declaration pages
  • Sign any other required documents
  • Upload them online or submit by mail or in person to Enrolment Services.
